articles.author: Ernest Owens
articles.title: Can We Admit Mainstreaming Juneteenth Has Been a Disaster? - The Daily Beast
articles.description: Nearly two years after being nationally recognized, the celebration of Black American emancipation has turned into a misguided holiday of performativity.
articles.content: On June 17, 2021, nearly a year after the murder of George Floyd, President Joe Biden thought it was a bright idea to make Juneteenth an official U.S. holidaysigning it into law, to be observed by al… [+4721 chars]
